hero.title: Stop Waiting, Start Healing
hero.subtitle: Find nearby clinics, view real-time wait times, and join queues digitally. Make healthcare visits predictable and stress-free.

problem.title: The Problem with Current Clinic Visits

wastedTime.title: Wasted Time in Queues
wastedTime.description: Hours spent waiting in crowded clinics with no idea when you'll be seen.

staffBurnout.title: Staff Burnout
staffBurnout.description: Healthcare workers overwhelmed by manual queue management and administrative chaos.

poorExperience.title: Poor Patient Experience
poorExperience.description: Unpredictable wait times leading to stress and frustration for patients seeking care.

solution.title: Our Smart Solution
solution.subtitle: Find My Clinic bridges the information gap in local healthcare with real-time queue management and intelligent wait time predictions.

realTimeDiscovery.title: Real-Time Clinic Discovery
realTimeDiscovery.description: Find nearby clinics instantly with live wait times and availability status.

digitalQueue.title: Digital Queue Management
digitalQueue.description: Get your queue token remotely and receive notifications when it's your turn.

qrCode.title: Personal QR Code Generator
qrCode.description: Generate a personal QR code to instantly share your details and speed up access.

step1.title: Find Your Clinic
step1.description: Search for nearby clinics and view real-time wait times.

step2.title: Join the Queue
step2.description: Get your digital queue token and track your position.

step3.title: Get Notified
step3.description: Receive notifications when it's your turn to be seen.

findClinics.title: Find Clinics Near You
findClinics.subtitle: Real-time availability and wait times at your fingertips

features.title: What Makes Us Different
features.subtitle: Smart, inclusive, and accessible healthcare technology

qrCode.title: Personal QR Code Generator
qrCode.description: Generate a personal QR code to instantly share your details and speed up access.

smartPredictions.title: Smart Predictions
smartPredictions.description: AI-powered predictive intelligence analyzes historical data and current patterns to provide the most accurate wait time estimates.

liteMode.title: Lite Mode Available
liteMode.description: WhatsApp and SMS integration for clinics with limited tech infrastructure, making our platform accessible to every healthcare provider.

forClinics.title: Transform Your Clinic Operations
forClinics.subtitle: Reduce administrative burden and improve patient satisfaction

efficientManagement.title: Efficient Digital Management
efficientManagement.description: Simple admin panel or WhatsApp bot to manage queues, update wait times, and scan patient QR codes for instant check-in.

reducedBurnout.title: Reduced Staff Burnout
reducedBurnout.description: Eliminate manual queue management stress and reduce administrative chaos with automated patient flow.

betterAllocation.title: Better Resource Allocation
betterAllocation.description: Optimize staff scheduling and improve operational efficiency with predictive patient flow data.

technology.title: Built on Robust Technology
technology.subtitle: Enterprise-grade architecture designed for scalability, reliability, and seamless user experience

microservices.title: Microservices Architecture
microservices.description: Scalable and reliable system architecture ensuring 99.9% uptime and seamless performance.

realTime.title: Real-Time Processing
realTime.description: Lightning-fast data processing with sub-second response times for live queue updates.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: Bank-grade security with end-to-end encryption and compliance with healthcare data standards.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the passionate team behind Find My Clinic

emergency.description: In case of emergency, contact the appropriate service immediately.

chatbot.title: Health Assistant
chatbot.greeting: Hello! I'm your healthcare assistant. I can help you with general health questions, symptom information, and guide you to appropriate care. How can I assist you today?
chatbot.disclaimer: This is not medical advice. Consult healthcare professionals for medical concerns.
